description.value:
"Your early years were spent in a constant state of intrigue, as you warred silently with your siblings, cousins and rivals to be the one who inherited the power and the prestige."

Those who failed would be condemned to lives of lesser significance, always overshadowed by the one who claimed the prize. In the end, long-fought political battles and hard-won cunning paid off and you stand triumphantâ€”and alone.

The struggle to claim your inheritance taught you to trust no one completely, always watching for the next rival or threat.

system.benefit: You gain the Paranoia talent and Deceive as a trained Skill. Additionally, you receive a +3 bonus to either Intelligence or Perception (your choice).
system.notes: Grants Paranoia talent, Deceive skill, and +3 to Int or Per.

specialAbilities.name: Survivor of Intrigue
specialAbilities.description: Choose either Intelligence or Perception. That characteristic receives a permanent +3 bonus, representing the mental sharpness you developed while navigating family politics.
